title: Classic Ferrington Guitars: Featuring the Custom-made Guitars of Master Luthier Danny Ferrington
description: Danny Ferrington is a master guitar maker. He has made custom guitars for some of the music scenes most popular players; Linda Ronstadt, Elvis Costello, Ry Cooder, Kurt Cobain all played Classic Ferrington Guitars. This book offers an up-close look at his unique guitars and shows off his amazing craftmanship and superb detailing. Also included is a CD featuring music made by these artists playing Ferrington's instruments. so not only can you appreciate the art of his work BUT now the sound as well.
author: Kate Giel
